info.name: vets-api-upgraded-eks
info.description:
This collection leverages test user 228 from the TUD to acquire authentication tokens and then test endpoints.

[Endpoints under test](https://department-of-veterans-affairs.github.io/va-digital-services-platform-docs/api-reference/#/)

  
Key points for running this collection:

- The Mock Auth Flow requests must be sent sequentially to achieve an authenticated state. The tokens are either stored in this collection's variables or cookie jar.
    
- The most efficient way to run this collection is to click on the **Run** button on the above **vets-api-upgraded-eks** hotbar. Then click the **Run vets-api-upgraded-eks** button.
    
- Authentication persists for about one minute, if no requests are sent. I will probably test this and update for accuracy.
    
- Once the mock auth flow has been run in sequence, any requests made before auth expiration should be fully authenticated. At the time of writing, there may still be something missing here, as I am still encountering 403 codes on some requests.
    
- Postman runs all requests in a collection sequentially. This collection is arranged to ensure authentication always happens first during collection runs. Requests can be dragged into different order as deemed necessary.

// This test collection currently requires the user of vetsgovuser228
